posts.raw_content: This past few weeks has fucked me up.  I've always had a half ass relationship with our savior, mainly when I fucked up and needed to prey. This week I have wept for a man I never knew and only seen on random videos of him debating college kids.  I have felt a shift, I am seeing a shift.  Today I have knelt and asked for gods forgiveness, I bought a Bible " to read and understand". I want to thank you pedes, my frens, the shitposters that I check on daily at PDW. God bless all of you
